# Tools

> Standard library tools.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var tools = require( '@stdlib/tools' );
```

#### tools

Standard library tools.

``` javascript
var t = tools;
// returns {...}
```

<!-- </usage> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better examples -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var tools = require( '@stdlib/tools' );

console.log( getKeys( tools ) );
```
